IndexTotalFieldsLimit.title: Maximum number of fields in an index
IndexTotalFieldsLimit.description: Specify the maximum number of fields that can be included in an index. Exceeding this limit can result in performance issues. For more details, refer to the Elasticsearch8 documentation: https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/current/mapping.html#mapping-limit-settings

TokenFilter.title: Token filter
TokenFilter.description: Choose the token filter to apply when indexing searchable fields. This requires rebuilding the index

MinGram.title: Minimum gram length
MinGram.description: Specify the minimum number of characters in a gram. This requires rebuilding the index

MaxGram.title: Maximum gram length
MaxGram.description: Specify the maximum number of characters in a gram. This requires rebuilding the index

MinScore.title: Minimum score
MinScore.description: Specify the minimum score a document must have to be considered a match. Documents with scores below this threshold will not be included in the results. Set to 0 to return all documents. Applies when keyword is specified

MinScorePerDocumentType.title: Minimum score for document type
MinScorePerDocumentType.description: Specify the minimum score for the specific document type. Documents with scores below this threshold will not be included in the results. Set to 0 to return all documents. Applies when keyword is specified

DeleteDuplicateIndexes.title: Deleting duplicate active indexes
DeleteDuplicateIndexes.description: Search and delete duplicate active indexes before Delete and build operation

SemanticModelId.title: Semantic model Id
SemanticModelId.description: Make sure that semantic model ID is specified correctly

SemanticPipelineName.title: Semantic pipeline name
SemanticPipelineName.description: Make sure that semantic model pipeline name is specified correctly. It produces embeddings generated by the data indexing model

SemanticFieldName.title: Semantic field name
SemanticFieldName.description: Specify semantic model field name. Contains embeddings produced by the semantic pipeline. X.tokens or X.predicted_value

SemanticSearchType.title: Semantic model type
SemanticSearchType.description: Select semantic model type from the list

SemanticVectorModelDimensions.title: Vector model dimensions number
SemanticVectorModelDimensions.description: Specify the number of dimensions of the third party vector model. Typicaly found in the model description

KeywordBoost.title: Boost for keyword search
KeywordBoost.description: Specify a floating-point number to adjust the relevance score for documents matching keyword searches. Higher values increase the importance of keyword matches. Defaults to 1.0

SemanticBoost.title: Boost for semantic search
SemanticBoost.description: Specify a floating-point number to adjust the relevance score for documents matching semantic searches. Higher values increase the importance of semantic matches. Defaults to 1.0
